creator: luane@vine.co.za
text:
We use the log4j.xml config file with a DailyRollingFileAppender specified.

It works fine, until an error ocurrs.

Sometimes it logs the Errors to the DailyFile (our destination file),
but other days it does not.

It is quite frustrating as we do not know what is causing the Error, as we
have no info in our DailyFile.

What could be the possible reason for this?

Is this a common issue? Or are we doing something wrong?
